question: Soil erosion is a result of forests being cut down carelessly.

answers.text: That forests are being cut down carelessly results from soil erosion
Soil erosion contributes to forests being cut down carelessly
Soil erosion results in forests being cut down carelessly
That forests are being cut down carelessly leads to soil erosion

correct_answer: That forests are being cut down carelessly leads to soil erosion
explanation: Hiện tượng mòn đất là kết quả của việc rừng bị chặt phá một cách không cẩn thận.
